1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Definition of relmap operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Define
6  ( RopDefine,
7    ropList, def,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax  as S
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core    as C
12
13-- | Constructor, usage, and attribute sorter
14type RopDefine c = (C.RopCons c, C.RopUsage, S.AttrLayout)
15
16-- | Make implementations of relmap operators.
17ropList
18    :: String         -- ^ Operator group
19    -> [RopDefine c]  -- ^ Operator definitions
20    -> [C.Rop c]      -- ^ Relmap operators
21ropList group = map rop where
22    rop (cons, usage, attr) =
23        let name   = head $ words usage
24            sorter = S.attrParaBy attr
25        in C.Rop name group usage attr sorter cons
26
27-- | Make definition of relmap operator.
28def :: C.RopCons c -> C.RopUsage -> String -> RopDefine c
29def cons usage attr = (cons, usage, S.parseAttrLayout attr)
30
